title: Goatwhore-Funeral Dirge For The Rotting Sun  mp3  320k  ak6103
description:
Goatwhore-Funeral Dirge For The Rotting Sun  mp3  320k  ak6103 What we got...Funeral Dirge for the Rotting Sun is Goatwhore's second full-length studio album. A music video was made for the song "Blood Guilt Eucharist".

11. 	"The Black Art of Deception"   	2:17
12. 	"Baptized in a Storm of Swords"   	3:49

    Sammy Duet - Guitar
    Zak Nolan - Drums
    Patrick Bruders - Bass
Another Band that I like and wont forget when I see the next shiny thing......and you can help me by seeding if you like em because unknown bands dont stay around for long so seed.....
